tool_description: Records and timestamps customer engagement activities across multiple channels for point accumulation tracking.

activity_type.description: Type of activity: purchase, social_share, referral, review, survey, app_login, newsletter_signup

activity_value.description: Monetary value or quantity associated with activity

channel.description: Channel where activity occurred: website, mobile_app, store, email, social

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer ID must be a non-empty string and exist in the system.
Unsupported activity_type: Use one of [purchase, social_share, referral, review, survey, app_login, newsletter_signup].
Invalid timestamp: Provide valid ISO 8601 date-time format and ensure timestamp is not in the future.
Invalid activity_value: Value must be a non-negative number.
Unsupported channel: Use one of [website, mobile_app, store, email, social].
usage: Provide customer_id, activity_type, and activity_timestamp. Optionally specify activity_value for monetary activities and channel for tracking source.

activity_id.description: Unique identifier for this activity record

status.description: Recording status: recorded, duplicate_detected, or validation_pending

recorded_timestamp.description: When the activity was recorded in the system
